data.name: Priyaben Trivedi
data.body: We've been stocking mouth fresheners for our family shop in Rajkot since 2021. The beetroot amla variety is popular with health-conscious customers. Good margins and consistent supply.

data.name: Kiransinh Patel
data.body: As a distributor in Maninagar, I source directly from Surat suppliers. Their multi seeds mukhwas moves fast in our area. Professional dealing and they understand small business needs.

data.name: Meera Singh
data.body: Ordered samples first, then placed bulk order. The traditional jaiphal variety has good shelf life and customers like the authentic taste. Packaging protects well during transport.

data.name: Bhavesh Shah
data.body: Running grocery store in Vastrapur since 10 years. Started stocking these products last year - the roasted varieties are gaining popularity. Reasonable wholesale rates from Surat.

data.name: Dhavalbhai Modi
data.body: Supply chain from Surat to Bopal is efficient. The makhana mix variety suits our customer base. They provide proper invoicing and GST documentation for our records.

data.name: Hitesh Desai
data.body: Being in same city, we get fresh stock regularly from local manufacturers. The roasted varieties with natural ingredients appeal to health-aware customers in our area.

data.name: Jayaben Gohil
data.body: Small pan shop in Satellite area. Basic fennel mukhwas has consistent taste and quality. Customers return for the same product regularly, which means good repeat business for us.

data.name: Manishbhai Joshi
data.body: Trading in Navsari for many years. Tried sesame-based varieties - they move well in our local market. Rates are competitive compared to other Gujarat suppliers.

data.name: Nilesh Thakkar
data.body: Shop in Katargam area. Get fresh supplies and quick delivery from nearby production units. The coconut flakes variety works well for customers wanting something different.

data.name: Ashaben Pandya
data.body: Small retail outlet on CG Road. Mix varieties work well for gifting customers during festivals. Quality packaging makes products suitable for occasions. Decent profit margins.

data.name: Pankajbhai Raval
data.body: Been in Paldi market for years. During winter months, jaggery-based varieties sell better to local customers. Surat production means fresher stock compared to distant suppliers.

data.name: Dipika Shah
data.body: Our Pal area shop serves office crowd. Cardamom variety is popular for after-lunch refreshment. Suppliers provide proper trade terms and payment flexibility for small retailers.
